Athens 56, Mithradates 3, Ariarathes 10, Achaean League and den., many); New York 28 (Athens); von Aulock 1 (SNG 6300, tetradr. of Ariarathes) Thompson, Athens, pp. 504-6, illus.; NC 1962, pp. 312-3 Lewis, NC 1962, pp. 281-2 Mørkholm, Essays Robinson, pp. 243-4 Crawford, RRCH 255 This hd. was formerly known as the Abruzzi Hoard; Crawford gives the Athenian total as 97.
